function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of focus on the role of green areas in disease propagation","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease spread in urban areas","Mitigation":"Increase awareness of the role of green areas in disease transmission and implement targeted disease control measures","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, disease surveillance technology, green space design for disease prevention","People":"Urban residents, visitors to urban parks, municipal authorities","Owner":"Public health agencies, municipalities"},{"Description":"Lack of dedicated park management","Impact":"Undertrained staff and lack of resources for disease prevention and control in urban parks","Mitigation":"Establish dedicated park management with trained staff and adequate resources for disease prevention","Technologies":"Training programs for park staff, funding for park management, disease prevention guidelines","People":"Park visitors, urban residents, municipal authorities","Owner":"Municipal governments, park management agencies"}]}
